price: Guyyaa isaan hunda walitti qabnus, (dubbadhu). Ergasii isaan Nutti qindeessaniin ni jenna: “Isiniifi warri isin Nu waliin gabbaraa turtanis iddoo jirtan dhaabadhaa!” Sana booda gidduu isaanii addaan baafne. Warri isaan Nu waliin gabbaraa turaniis: “Isin nu gabbaraa hin turre” jedhu.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُواْ مَكَانَكُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَشُرَكَآؤُكُمۡۚ فَزَيَّلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ شُرَكَآؤُهُم مَّا كُنتُمۡ إِيَّانَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayawma naḥshuruhum jamīʿan thumma naqūlu lilladhīna ashrakū makānakum antum washurakāukum fazayyalnā baynahum waqāla shurakāuhum mā kuntum iyyānā taʿbudūna
